publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3369 Michael McMahon: Hamilton Academical Football Clubâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Hamilton Academical Football Club for winning a place in the final of the Bells Challenge Cup against St Mirren, to be held at New Broomfield on Sunday 6 November 2005; notes that this means a great deal to the fans of the club, coming as it does after a long struggle back to the top divisions of Scottish football; encourages the entire town and people of South Lanarkshire to get behind the team, and urges as many people from the town as possible to go along to the match.
S2M-3369 Hamilton Academical Football Club (lodged on 30 September 2005) Alex Neil*, Des McNulty*, Scott Barrie*, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-3369 Hamilton Academical Football Club (lodged on 30 September 2005) Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Michael Matheson*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-3369 Hamilton Academical Football Club (lodged on 30 September 2005) Mr Duncan McNeil*
S2M-3369 Hamilton Academical Football Club (lodged on 30 September 2005) Mrs Mary Mulligan*
S2M-3369 Hamilton Academical Football Club (lodged on 30 September 2005) Donald Gorrie*
